body: I have a minecon cape myself and I think it'd be cool to change what's on it every once in a while. I know the purpose of the minecon cape is to show which minecon you attended, but if players could change between what the image on the cape is while the color still stays minecon year - specific, it could make these a bit more interesting while still keeping the uniqueness of each years cape. Below I made a cape for each possible combination. The people who attended 2011 minecon would have the red capes, 2012 the blue, 2013 the green.
